title: Ratatouille
description: Rich tomato sauce with soft aubergine, courgette and peppers  - this vegetarian dish is a favourite with everyone.Each serving provides 223kcal, 5.5g protein, 17.5g carbohydrate (of which 16g sugars), 12g fat (of which 2g saturates), 10g fibre and	0g salt.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
